channel.title: DigitalFrontiers on Curious Musings
channel.description: Recent content in DigitalFrontiers on Curious Musings

item.title: Digital chimney smoke?
item.description:
Daniel Boone is quoted (via Hubert Humphrey) as saying

when he could see the smoke from another chimney, felt himself too crowded and moved further out into the wilderness.

Mark Twain said

Whenever you find yourself on the side of the majority, it is time to pause and reflect.
